room_title: Escape room "The Pandemic" by Hour Glass Escape Games in Bowling Green
room_address: 1043 Pedigo Way Suite 13, Bowling Green, KY 42103
room_description: After months of planning your attack, you break into the Hour Glass Laboratory, but mid-heist, your plans are foiled as you are knocked unconscious, blindfolded, chained, and locked inside of a holding cell. You have one hour before the police arrive to lock you up for life. Find your way out of the Laboratory, but not before accomplishing what you went there for. Hack your way into the Hour Glass Laboratory Database and infect the world 1 country at a time until you have reached a widespread Pandemic.
